title: The Hoodoo Gurus - Mars Needs Guitars [320k MP3, VBR]
description:
"Mars Needs Guitars" is the Hoodoo Gurus' 2nd album, released in 1985 in Australia (1987 in the US).  I bought this when it came out, and ripped the CD to 320kbps, VBR MP3 format.  This is NOT the 2005 re-release with the bonus tracks.  I only have the original release CD, so that's what this is.  Every song is catchy, with jangly guitars, fun lyrics, and memorable hooks.  Share and enjoy!  Please comment if you love the Hoodooo Gurus!

All written tracks by Faulkner unless otherwise indicated.[4]
